text: is a former Japanese football player. He played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Yoshimizu was born on August 21, 1946. After graduating from Keio University, he joined Japan Soccer League club Furukawa Electric in 1969. He retired in 1972. He played 53 games and scored 6 goals in the league. On July 31, 1970, Yoshimizu debuted for the Japan national team against Hong Kong. He played 4 games and scored 1 goal for Japan in 1970. ==Statistics== Japan National Football Team Database |- |1970||4||1 |- !Total||4||1 |} ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese footballers Category:Japan international footballers Category:Japan Soccer League players Category:JEF United Chiba players
title: Norio Yoshimizu
